description: Creates an order for phone numbers to be provisioned. For numbers outside the U.S., you must use the Amazon Chime SDK SIP media application dial-in product type.

parameters.name: E164PhoneNumbers
parameters.description: List of phone numbers, in E.164 format. (string) ---

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberOrderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the phone order.

nested_items.name: ProductType
nested_items.description: The phone number order product type.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the phone number order.

nested_items.name: OrderType
nested_items.description: The type of phone number being ordered, local or toll-free.

nested_items.name: OrderedPhoneNumbers
nested_items.description: The ordered phone number details, such as the phone number in E.164 format and the phone number status.

nested_items.name: E164PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The phone number order creation time stamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The updated phone number order time stamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: FocDate
nested_items.description: The Firm Order Commitment (FOC) date for phone number porting orders. This field is null if a phone number order is not a porting order.
